REFERENCE: Japan Cabinet Office Emergency Disaster Management Report (2018/06/25)
COMMENTS: This should be taken as the most reliable source as it is an official report from the Japanese government one week following the event; mapping to DS categories is approximate. Provided injury statistics are disaggregated between severe and minor injuries in the report.
